about_button: Let’s get to know each other
about_text: My name is Mariia Hlushenko, and I am a certified specialist with many years of experience.
about_title: Welcome to our peaceful massage oasis!
authorsTechniquesText: By using various massage techniques, I create a refined symphony of working with your body that restores the balance of your physical and spiritual state. Each session is unique, each movement fills you from within.
book_now: Book your massage session today and let yourself experience true bliss and rejuvenation.
escape: Allow yourself a moment to escape from daily worries and give your body the well-deserved rest.
expectation: Massage: What to Expect from a Session?
goal: My goal is not just to relieve physical discomfort but also to create a deep connection between your body and mind.
googleSignIn: We’d love to hear your feedback! Please sign in with Google to share your review.
invitation: I invite you to a massage session where you will be surrounded by attention, care, and a professional approach.
massage_benefits: Massage is not only about muscle relaxation but also about restoring inner harmony.
medicalEducation: Medical Education and Over 10 Years of Experience
medicalEducationText: My approach to massage is a true symbiosis of various techniques and methods I have perfected over many years. Every session is a unique journey where I combine different approaches to achieve the best result. From classical massage to deep tissue massage, from relaxing aromatherapy massages to acupressure and dry needling – my goal is to select what best meets your needs and your body’s health at the moment.
moreThanAServiceText: Every client who comes to my massage table carries their own story, told through their body. Your trust is my greatest reward, my dedication. Your recommendation to friends, family, and loved ones gives me the feeling that I am in the right place.
name: Name*:
oils: In my work, I use natural oils and aromas that enhance the massage effect and help you immerse yourself in an atmosphere of peace and relaxation.
stressRelief: get rid of stress and tension
welcome: Welcome to a world where massage becomes a special story!
